snippet: Yodlee positions itself as a way to gather data for a disparate number of online sites and programs — including ones like Credit Karma, LearnVest and BillGuard — and put them in one place.
abstract: Yodlee positions itself as a way to gather data for a disparate number of online sites and programs — including ones like Credit Karma, LearnVest and BillGuard — and put them in one place.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Yodlee, a Hub for Financial Apps, Raises $75 Million in I.P.O.
